price: except his wife[28]; We have decreed that she will be among those who stay behind.”
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: [28] For she has collaborated with the evildoers.
